channel.title: Anyone remember 2006?
channel.description: Anyone remember back in 2006.. man playing private servers was so fun bck then :)

2006? Lol, I can bearly remember yeasterday, But anyway I remember 2 years ago with the simple privet servers, Ahhh… the good times, The simple servers, Fagex not breathing down peoples necks, Runescape not being so gay, Omgosh I miss the old RSPS’s : (((
[/quote]

What the fuck is a bearly? What the fuck is a privet?[/quote] What the fuck is you’re face, I am a 14 year old kid, I have a low IQ and I was rushing this message so GTFO this earth, Ty.

item.description:

My fave was “punkscape” by Chase Young. It was the same as most servers, easy money, bad economy, basic leech. But I LOVED it. IDK why, but it was brilliant, but Chase took it down

item.title: Anyone remember 2006?
item.dc:creator: @Z_0_D_I_A_C Z 0 D I A C
item.description:
@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:36, topic:292653”][quote author=Z 0 D I A C link=topic=386639.msg2899202#msg2899202 date=1249414824]

To be honest, I liked Silab servers before anything else.

They were so easy, just get the IP and go to the Silab webclient.

There is no such thing as “Silab Servers” thank you.
[/quote]
technically i hosted a server in 06 i have the only silab server to date :p[/quote]

I see I see. well that makes sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember 2006?
item.dc:creator: @barelypassing barelypassing
item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

I remember… The first server I ever played was something called BlackScape. The first server I coded (a basic leech) was off of Pkisle… I called it GuthanScape. Then I made a dodian base which was coded 50% by me because of all my work, and features I added. That was GuthanScape 2… But that was a Jagex server (silab). My first (the leech) was the greatest one. I also hosted a couple edited pimpscape’s, and may start working on a 317 mopar compatible BarelyScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember 2006?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Yeah.

I remember the old ass sources from '06 with the object training, then the bastards who stood outside killing you.

That was fun, I used to stay up till like 12 AM playing RSPS when I first found out about it. ;o
Now, it’s just Delta source after Delta source after Delta source.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember 2006?
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:32, topic:292653”][quote author=Natey link=topic=386639.msg2899262#msg2899262 date=1249416996]
I HIGHLY agree with you Lin, I didn’t play servers until this early March, and it was a Delta base and I thought it was fun, but you had to site AGES at assault getting bandos/DFS/etc; and it got boring if you died pking, and the exp was somewhat fast, 3k a hit, took forever to get some 99’s though, and who ever say Silab servers have the best, most awesome pking, you need to get a god damn brain scan, Silab pking sucks ass on multiple levels, I mean your wearing full armadyl with obby maul and dfs with like 500+ bonuses, and the pking,veng, etc; is trash/garbage/worthless, I mean why not go on a real DOWNLOADABLE client and pk on there where it is real bonuses for somewhat real pking, anyways, I think the old '06 servers sounded fun, but did they have the emote teleports, if they did, they I really don’t like them already.
[/quote]

I honestly think that rsps clients are getting by the day, while are servers are going the other way. 06 servers were a phase, silab was a phase, and now we haved moved on to the ‘delta’ phase. These phases are getting worse. We can’t help but to watch these phases pass by us by as we just sit here and say ’ SHET SHET SHET!!!11!1!! DELTA SUCKS BAWLS!!! WHERE IS PROJECT 16!!! ’

Silab is better than what we have now, and '06 was better than silab, the only way to stop this viscous cycle is to make a balance of servers, the only servers we see these days are deltascape based. The only thing we can do, and what i say we SHOULD do is make a HUGE project and give a server base to each of the more active moparscapers (So not just the vets xD) so we have some czar here, devo there, all star behind, and 06 in the front.[/quote]

Servers are getting better as time goes by. Only the typical MoparScaper uses the shit we all say we hate yet still use. If we are to get out of this mess, we need to use the great frameworks provided.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381494
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,227037
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309081

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember 2006?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Natey:

I HIGHLY agree with you Lin, I didn’t play servers until this early March, and it was a Delta base and I thought it was fun, but you had to site AGES at assault getting bandos/DFS/etc; and it got boring if you died pking, and the exp was somewhat fast, 3k a hit, took forever to get some 99’s though, and who ever say Silab servers have the best, most awesome pking, you need to get a god damn brain scan, Silab pking sucks ass on multiple levels, I mean your wearing full armadyl with obby maul and dfs with like 500+ bonuses, and the pking,veng, etc; is trash/garbage/worthless, I mean why not go on a real DOWNLOADABLE client and pk on there where it is real bonuses for somewhat real pking, anyways, I think the old '06 servers sounded fun, but did they have the emote teleports, if they did, they I really don’t like them already.

I honestly think that rsps clients are getting by the day, while are servers are going the other way. 06 servers were a phase, silab was a phase, and now we haved moved on to the ‘delta’ phase. These phases are getting worse. We can’t help but to watch these phases pass by us by as we just sit here and say ’ SHET SHET SHET!!!11!1!! DELTA SUCKS BAWLS!!! WHERE IS PROJECT 16!!! ’

Silab is better than what we have now, and '06 was better than silab, the only way to stop this viscous cycle is to make a balance of servers, the only servers we see these days are deltascape based. The only thing we can do, and what i say we SHOULD do is make a HUGE project and give a server base to each of the more active moparscapers (So not just the vets xD) so we have some czar here, devo there, all star behind, and 06 in the front.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone remember 2006?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:19, topic:292653”][quote author=Z 0 D I A C link=topic=386639.msg2898528#msg2898528 date=1249367719]
Silabsoft & 508+ servers ruined those servers.
Nowadays its always.
Custom client. Earning. Fail owners. That isn’t what private servers is about.
[/quote]Mainly. After playing Fr33Sc4p3 yesterday, it made me realize that people just made the exact opposite of RuneScape - Fast leveling, phats everywhere, quick items, etc. Nowadays, it’s all about challenges and paying for good stuff.[/quote]I HIGHLY agree with you Lin, I didn’t play servers until this early March, and it was a Delta base and I thought it was fun, but you had to site AGES at assault getting bandos/DFS/etc; and it got boring if you died pking, and the exp was somewhat fast, 3k a hit, took forever to get some 99’s though, and who ever say Silab servers have the best, most awesome pking, you need to get a god damn brain scan, Silab pking sucks ass on multiple levels, I mean your wearing full armadyl with obby maul and dfs with like 500+ bonuses, and the pking,veng, etc; is trash/garbage/worthless, I mean why not go on a real DOWNLOADABLE client and pk on there where it is real bonuses for somewhat real pking, anyways, I think the old '06 servers sounded fun, but did they have the emote teleports, if they did, they I really don’t like them already.

Read full topic
